owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Michael Schulze
owl:Ontology.dc:description: This research work is part of P2P-O, a purchase-to-pay ontology for enabling semantic invoices. This module reuses, among other things, the European Standard EN 16931-1.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Invoice Module of P2P-O
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Invoice Module of P2P-O

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the location at which the goods and services are delivered.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: deliver to location

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: To which the goods and services are delivered.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: deliver to party
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Shall be used if the Deliver to party is different from the Buyer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the allowance percentage, to calculate the allowance amount.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has allowance base amount

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique banking reference identifier of the Payee or Seller assigned by the Payee or Seller bank.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has bank assigned creditor identifier
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Used in order to pre-notify the Buyer of a SEPA direct debit.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The amount of a charge, without VAT.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has charge amount

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the charge percentage, to calculate the charge amount.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has charge base amount

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The account to be debited by the direct debit.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has debited account identifier
has direct debit account
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: May be used to give prior notice in the invoice that payment will be made through a SEPA or other direct debit initiated by the Seller, in accordance with the rules of the SEPA or other direct debit scheme.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier assigned by the Payee for referencing the direct debit mandate.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has mandate reference identifier
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Used in order to pre-notify the Buyer of a SEPA direct debit.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: the role that receives the payment.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has payee

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has payment account

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier of the financial payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has payment account identifier
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Such as IBAN (in case of a SEPA payment) or a national account number.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Card used for payment contemporaneous with invoice issuance.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has payment card
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Only used if the Buyer had opted to pay by using a payment card such as a credit or debit card.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the payment service provider where a payment account is located.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has payment service provider
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: payment account is located. Such as a BIC or a national clearing code where required. No identification scheme to be used.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Sum of all allowances on document level in the Invoice.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total allowances amount
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Allowances on line level are included in the Invoice line net amount which is summed up into the Sum of Invoice line net amount.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The total amount of the Invoice with VAT.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total amount with VAT
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: The Invoice total amount with VAT is the Invoice total amount without VAT plus the Invoice total VAT amount.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The total amount of the Invoice without VAT.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total amount without VAT
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: The Invoice total amount without VAT is the Sum of Invoice line net amount minus Sum of allowances on document level plus Sum of charges on document level.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Sum of all charges on document level in the Invoice.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total charges amount
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Charges on line level are included in the Invoice line net amount which is summed up into the Sum of Invoice line net amount.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The outstanding amount that is requested to be paid.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total due for payment amount
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: This amount is the Document total amount with VAT minus the paid amount that has been paid in advance. The amount is zero in case of a fully paid Invoice. The amount may be negative; in that case the Seller owes the amount to the Buyer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Sum of all document line net amounts in the document.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total line net amount

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The sum of amounts which have been paid in advance.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total paid amount
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: This amount is subtracted from the invoice total amount with VAT to calculate the amount due for payment.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total rounding amount
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: The amount to be added to the invoice total to round the amount to be paid.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The total VAT amount for the Invoice.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total value added tax amount
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: The Invoice total VAT amount is the sum of all VAT category tax amounts.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The VAT total amount expressed in the accounting currency accepted or required in the country of the Seller.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has total value added tax amount in accounting currency
owl:ObjectProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: To be used when the VAT accounting currency (BT-6) differs from the Invoice currency code (BT-5) in accordance with article 230 of Directive 2006/112 / EC on VAT. The VAT amount in accounting currency is not used in the calculation of the Invoice totals.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: links to the seller in an invoice
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is seller in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The identification of an Invoice that was previously sent by the Seller.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: preceding invoice

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: the date on which the supply of goods or services was made or completed.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: actual delivery date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the allowance base amount, to calculate the allowance amount.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: allowance percentage

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The reason for the allowance, expressed as text.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: allowance reason

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The reason for the allowance, expressed as a code.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: allowance reason code
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Use entries of the UNTDID 5189 code list. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears, to enable the Buyer to process the Invoice in an appropriate way.
To be specified by the Buyer.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: business process context note

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A textual value that specifies where to book the relevant data into the Buyer's financial accounts.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: buyer accounting reference

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An identifier assigned by the Buyer used for internal routing purposes.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: buyer reference
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: The identifier is defined by the Buyer (e.g. contact ID, department, office id, project code), but provided by the Seller in the Invoice.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the charge base amount, to calculate the charge amount.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: charge percentage

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The reason for the charge, expressed as text.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: charge reason

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The reason for the charge, expressed as a code.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: charge reason code
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Use entries of the UNTDID 7161 code list. The charge reason code and the charge reason shall indicate the same charge reason.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A textual note that gives unstructured information that is relevant to the Invoice as a whole.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: invoice note
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Such as the reason for any correction or assignment note in case the invoice has been factored

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The subject of the textual note in BT-22 (https://purl.org/p2p-o/invoice#invoiceNote)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: invoice note subject code
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: To be chosen from the entries in UNTDID 4451

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: a reference of an invoice (e.g. reference number)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: invoice number

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An identifier for an object on which the invoice is based, given by the Seller.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: invoice object identifier

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date when the Invoice period ends
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: invoicing period end date
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: The date on which the delivery of goods or services was completed.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date when the Invoice period starts.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: invoicing period start date
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: The initial date of delivery of goods or services

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of the payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: payment account name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of the payment card holder.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: payment card holder name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The Primary Account Number (PAN) of the card used for payment.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: payment card primary account number
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: In accordance with card payments security standards an invoice should never include a full card primary account number. At the moment PCI Security Standards Council has defined that the first 6 digits and last 4 digits are the maximum number of digits to be shown.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The means, expressed as code, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: payment means type
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Entries from the UNTDID 4461 code list [6] shall be used. Distinction should be made between SEPA and non-SEPA payments, and between credit payments, direct debits, card payments and other instruments.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The means, expressed as text, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: payment means
owl:DatatypeProperty.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Such as cash, credit transfer, direct debit, credit card, etc.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A textual value used to establish a link between the payment and the Invoice, issued by the Seller.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: remittance information

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: use UNTDID 2005 for codes
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: value added tax point date code

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: payment account

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Card used for payment contemporaneous with invoice issuance.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: payment card
owl:Class.AnnotationVocabulary:usageNote: Only used if the Buyer had opted to pay by using a payment card such as a credit or debit card.
